channel.title: [PI] Custom combat levels [PI]
channel.description:
Alright basically I'd like to know if there's a way you could set a custom combat for a player without any stat changing etcetera.
By this I mean perhaps a player could have the combat level 139?
Does anyone know:
[ol][li] Know how to do this[/li] [li] Any links for a tutorial on how to do this[/li][/ol]
Thanks.
